translate.english: from now on / in the future

examples.example: 我会在今后的日子里更加努力地提升自己。

translate.english: I will make more efforts to improve myself in the future days.

examples.example: 我相信在今后的人生道路上，我会收获更多的幸福和成功。

translate.english: I believe that in the future life path, I will gain more happiness and success.

examples.example: 我期待在今后的生活中能体验更多的美好与精彩。

translate.english: I look forward to experiencing more beauty and wonder in the future life.
